column4: Is there a good online resource for themes/interfaces for ubuntu (a la win32 programs like WindowBlinds or ThemeXP)?  i want a more "slick" look to my OS and I don't know where to start
yep, you switch between them under "sessions" in GDM
so it's not a risk to have more than one window manager installed?  no conflicts or anything?
When you're logging in (that's called GDM, assuming you're using ubuntu currently), there's a"sessions" button, you can change what DE you're logging into
OK.  so GDM is just the graphical login, right, that's the impression I've been under from installing other distros
